law.catch_line: Standards for brake fluid and Transportation Cabinet's regulations.

text.section: Every hydraulic brake fluid that shall be sold, offered for sale, or used for service in any vehicle shall conform to the standards and specifications of the Society of Automotive Engineers applicable to such fluid.

The Transportation Cabinet shall adopt and enforce regulations and standards which shall be compatible with the standards and specifications of the Society of Automotive Engineers, so far as practicable.

law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(17). -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 116, secs. 2 and 3, effective June 16, 1960.
